issue.title: JDEBUG mode not compatible with BASKET
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

In JDEBUG mode, it is impossible to save a basket.

The call to "task=basket.saveProduct" returns an error due to the underlying call to JSession::checkToken() which always returns "false" in DEBUG mode.

This can be a problem for developers, without the JDEBUG activated, all the libraries used in the basket (and there is libraries...) are loaded in their minified versions.
